name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Customer Engineer with over 10 years of experience in data management and integration, specializing in **SAP**, **SAP S/4HANA**, **SAP BW**, and **SAP Business Technology Platform**. Proficient in ensuring data governance, data quality, and compliance with regulatory standards across financial platforms. Skilled in developing scalable solutions and managing PaaS environments while maintaining high standards for data privacy and security. Strong collaborator with a proven ability to deliver customer-focused solutions and enhance process management. Previous engagements include roles at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, where I delivered impactful projects and established best practices for financial audits and data cataloging.
